text: Jeffery Jones (born February 8, 1958) is the former Mayor of Paterson, the third largest city in New Jersey. He served from 2010 to 2014. The Paterson City Council censured Mayor Jeffery Jones for refusing to testify about why he and top salaried officials received nearly $51,000 in overtime following Hurricane Irene. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Paterson, New Jersey Category:New Jersey Democrats Category:African-American mayors in New Jersey
title: Jeffery Jones (mayor)
